PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_SP_RX_STATIC_CFG
PARAMETER.description: parameter used to configure the static configuration of speaker#[ #] protection Rx processing.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sp_rx_static_cfg_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minor version used for tracking the version of this parameter ID

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: features
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Features enabled#[ #] in the speaker protection algorithm.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: tuning_mode_en_flag
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies whether RTM tuning mode is enabled.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ctrl_rate
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Thermal control rate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: num_nch_filter_stages
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of notch filter stages.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: temp_loop_dly_ms
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Loop delay#[ #] from the predicted temperature to the temperature information coming back.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pow_est_smooth_flag
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies whether to use IIR filtering to smooth the power estimation.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: num_bs_filter_stages
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of#[ #] stages for band split LPF and HPF.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: num_ex_filter_taps
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number#[ #] of taps for the FIR excursion prediction filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pt_lvl_switch_en
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies whether to enable the dynamic pilot tone level switch.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pt_masking_delay_ms
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Delay in ramping down the pilot tone.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pt_masking_thr_q27
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies the input level threshold below which the pilot tone is disabled.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: agc_delay_ms
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies the agc delay in millisecond (ms).

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_SP_RX_STATIC_CFG_V1
PARAMETER.description: parameter used to configure the static configuration of#[ #] speaker protection v2 Rx processing.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sp_rx_static_cfg_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minor version used for tracking the version of this parameter ID

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: features
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Features enabled#[ #] in the speaker protection algorithm.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: tuning_mode_en_flag
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies whether RTM tuning mode is enabled.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ctrl_rate
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Thermal control rate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: num_nch_filter_stages
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of notch filter stages.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: temp_loop_dly_ms
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Loop delay#[ #] from the predicted temperature to the temperature information coming back.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pow_est_smooth_flag
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies whether to use IIR filtering to smooth the power estimation.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: num_bs_filter_stages
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of#[ #] stages for band split LPF and HPF.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: num_ex_filter_taps
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number#[ #] of taps for the FIR excursion prediction filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pt_lvl_switch_en
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies whether to enable the dynamic pilot tone level switch.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pt_masking_delay_ms
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Delay in ramping down the pilot tone.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pt_masking_thr_q27
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies the input level threshold below which the pilot tone is disabled.

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_FBSP_MODE_RX_CFG
PARAMETER.description: parameter used to configure the mode of feedback speaker#[ #] protection Rx processing

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sp_rx_mode_cfg_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minor version used for tracking the version of this parameter ID

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: mode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Mode of feedback speaker protection Rx processing

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_SP_RX_DYNAMIC_CFG
PARAMETER.description: parameter used to configure dynamic parameters for Speaker#[ #] Protection Rx module processing

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sp_rx_dynamic_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minor version used for tracking the version of this parameter ID

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: speakers_link_mode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies whether the gains applied to the two speakers are linked.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_pi_scale_u16q18
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left speaker: scale down a full scale 40 Hz pilot tone by this value.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_rx_scale_u16q16
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left speaker: scale down the outgoing signal by this value so when the pilot tone is added, the signal does not exceed#[ #] full scale.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_pi_scale_u16q18
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right speaker: scale down a full scale 40 Hz pilot tone by this value.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_rx_scale_u16q16
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right speaker: scale down the outgoing signal by this value so when the pilot tone is added, the signal does not exceed#[ #] full scale.

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_SP_RX_NOTCH_DYNAMIC_CFG
PARAMETER.description: Parameter used to configure notch dynamic parameters for#[ #] Feedback Speaker Protection Rx module processing

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sp_rx_notch_dynamic_cfg_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tracks the current version of this parameter

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: num
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Numerator#[ #] coefficients for notch filter configuration.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: den
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Denominator coefficients for notch filter configuration.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: num_q
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Q factor of#[ #] numerator coefficients for notch filter configuration.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: den_q
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Q factor of#[ #] denominator coefficients for notch filter configuration.

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_SP_RX_EX_DYNAMIC_CFG
PARAMETER.description: Parameter used to configure dynamic parameters for#[ #] Feedback Speaker Protection Rx module processing related to exertion

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sp_rx_ex_dynamic_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tracks the current version of this parameter

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: excursion_gain_recovery_constant_q31
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Excursion gain release constant.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: limiter_gain_recovery_constant_q31
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Limiter gain release constant.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_amp_gain_q24
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left speaker: amplifier gain used when scaling the Tx Vsens signal to an Rx signal.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_ptone_excursion_q16
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left speaker: excursion for the pilot tone. This excursion is added to the computed peak excursion.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_xmax_q24
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left#[ #] speaker: maximum excursion value.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_fir_taps
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left FIR:#[ #] Number of taps.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_fir_coeffq
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left FIR:#[ #] Q factor of coefficients.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_fir_coeffs
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left FIR: coefficients.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_lpf_num_ch
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left LPF: number#[ #] of channels.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_lpf_stages
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left LPF: number#[ #] of stages.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_lpf_num
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left LPF: numerator.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_lpf_den
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left LPF: denominator.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_lpf_num_q
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left#[ #] LPF: Q factor of numerator coefficients.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_lpf_den_q
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left#[ #] LPF: Q factor of denominator coefficients.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_hpf_num_ch
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left HPF: number#[ #] of channels.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_hpf_stages
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left HPF: number#[ #] of stages.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_hpf_num
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left HPF: numerator.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_hpf_den
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left HPF: denominator.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_hpf_num_q
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left#[ #] HPF: Q factor of numerator coefficients.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_hpf_den_q
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left#[ #] HPF: Q factor of denominator coefficients.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_xmax_margin_q24
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left speaker: margin used to modify the overall limiter gain.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_lim_thr_q27
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left speaker: limiter threshold.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_amp_gain_q24
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right speaker: amplifier gain used to scale the Tx Vsens signal to the Rx signal.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_ptone_excursion_q16
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right speaker: excursion for the pilot tone. This excursion is added to the computed peak excursion.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_xmax_q24
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right#[ #] speaker: xmax value.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_fir_taps
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right FIR:#[ #] Number of taps in the right FIR.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_fir_coeffq
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right#[ #] FIR: Q factor of coefficients.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_fir_coeffs
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right FIR: coefficients.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_lpf_num_ch
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right LPF:#[ #] number of channels.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_lpf_stages
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right LPF:#[ #] number of stages.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_lpf_num
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right LPF: numerator.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_lpf_den
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right LPF: denominator.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_lpf_num_q
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right#[ #] LPF: Q factor of numerator coefficients.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_lpf_den_q
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right#[ #] LPF: Q factor of denominator coefficients.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_hpf_num_ch
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right HPF:#[ #] number of channels.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_hpf_stages

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_hpf_num

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_hpf_den

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_hpf_num_q

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_hpf_den_q

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_xmax_margin_q24

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_lim_thr_q27
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right speaker: limiter threshold.

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_SP_RX_TH_DYNAMIC_CFG
PARAMETER.description: Parameter used to configure dynamic parameters for Feedback#[ #] Speaker Protection Rx module processing related to thermal

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sp_rx_th_dynamic_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tracks the current version of this parameter

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: temp_control_mthd
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Temperature control method.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: temp_nominal_q6
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Assumed voice coil temperature at startup. (in degree C)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: temp_min_q6
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minimum reasonable measured temperature. A temperature lower than this value is ignored. (in degree C)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: temp_max_q6
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Maximum#[ #] reasonable measured temperature. A temperature higher than this value is ignored.(in degree C)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: temp_max_chg_sec_q6
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Maximum#[ #] temperature change per second. A new temperature is ignored if it falls outside this range.(Set 0 to disables this feature)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: temp_smoothing_factor_q31
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing of the temperature to compute the gain.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: max_attenuation_db_q7
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minimum temperature control gain.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: attack_gain_smoothing_factor
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing factor for adjusting gain during the attack phase (current gain less than previous gain).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: release_gain_smoothing_factor
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothing factor for adjusting gain during the release phase (current gain greater than previous gain).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: temp_dead_zone_q6
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Dead zone#[ #] (region near the target temperature) for a reduced proportional term.(in degree C)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: dead_zone_scaling_q15
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Scaling factor to modify the proportional term.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: clip_time_out_ms
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Timeout in#[ #] milli seconds used for processing a clip interrupt.(value greater than 0 enables the clip interrupt timeout)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vbat_time_out_ms
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Timeout#[ #] in milli seconds used to process a VBAT interrupt. (value greater than 0 enables the VBAT interrupt timeout)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_r_spk_coil_q8
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left#[ #] speaker: typical resistance.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_v_full_scale_q10
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left speaker: voltage for a digitally full scale signal.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_thermal_resistance_q6
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left speaker: total thermal resistance (such as voice coil + magnet).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_thermal_time_constant_low_q10
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left speaker: low estimate of the voice coil thermal time constant. (in seconds)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_thermal_time_constant_high_q10
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left speaker: high estimate of voice coil thermal time constant. (in seconds)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_temp_tgt_q6
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left speaker: target temperature.(in degrees C)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_pi_ctrl_prop_value_q12
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left speaker: value of the proportional term in the PI controller.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_pi_ctrl_intg_value_q12
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left speaker: value of the integral term in the PI controller.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_r_spk_coil_q8
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right#[ #] speaker: typical resistance.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_v_full_scale_q10
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right speaker: speaker voltage for digitally full scale signal.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_thermal_resistance_q6
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right speaker: total thermal resistance (such as voice coil + magnet).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_thermal_time_constant_low_q10
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right speaker: low estimate of the voice coil thermal time constant.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_thermal_time_constant_high_q10
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right speaker: high estimate of the voice coil thermal time constant.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_temp_tgt_q6
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right speaker: target temperature.(in degrees C)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_pi_ctrl_prop_value_q12
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right speaker: value of the proportional term in PI controller.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_pi_ctrl_intg_value_q12
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right speaker: value of the integral term in the PI controller.

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_SP_RX_ACM_DYNAMIC_CFG
PARAMETER.description: Parameter used to configure dynamic parameters for#[ #] Feedback Speaker Protection Rx module processing related to audio clip manager

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sp_rx_acm_dynamic_cfg_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tracks the current version of this parameter

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: cdc_buf_q_format
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Q-format of the clip PCM values returned by the codec.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: clip_pcm_buf_len
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Length of buffer containing clip PCM values.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: lim_thr_to_clip_level_ratio_q15
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Limiter threshold = lim_thr_to_clip_level_ratio_q15 * clip PCM value.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: lowest_acc_clip_level_Q15
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Lowest acceptable clip level. Any clipping detecting below this level is ignored.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: thr_inc_step_in_db_Q15
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Limiter threshold increment per step_size_in_msec.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: thr_inc_period_in_msec
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Step (in milli seconds) size for the limiter threshold increment.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: loudness_boost_en
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enable or disable Loudness Boost mode.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: loudness_threshold_q27
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Maximum limiter threshold in Loudness Boost mode.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: loudness_temp_margin_q6
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Temperature prediction error window. An error is caused by corrupt Isen samples.

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_SP_RX_AGC_DYNAMIC_CFG
PARAMETER.description: Parameter used to configure dynamic parameters for#[ #] Feedback Speaker Protection Rx module processing related to Automatic Gain Control.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sp_rx_agc_dynamic_cfg_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minor version used for tracking the version of this parameter ID

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: channelLinked
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Parameter to set channel link mode.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: rmsTavUL16Q16
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Parameter for time Constant used to compute Input RMS.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: makeupGainUL32Q27
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Parameter to set Makeup Gain Value.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: dncompThresholdDBL32Q23
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Parameter to set downward compression threshold.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: dncompSlopeUL16Q16
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Parameter to set downward compression slope.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: upcompThresholdDBL32Q23
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Parameter to set upward compression threshold.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: upcompSlopeUL16Q16
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Parameter to set upward compression slope.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: expThresholdDBL32Q23
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Parameter to set expansion threshold.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: expSlopeL16Q8
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Parameter to set expansion slope.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: attackUL32Q31
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Parameter to set attack constant.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: releaseUL32Q31
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Parameter to set release constant.

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_SP_RX_LIMITER_TH
PARAMETER.description: Parameter used to configure dynamic parameters for Feedback#[ #] Speaker Protection Rx module processing related to limiter threshold per calib.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sp_rx_limiter_th_per_calib_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minor version used for tracking the version of this parameter ID

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: lim_thr_per_calib_q27
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: This limiter threshold whenever present will overwrite the limiter threshold setting from ACDB.

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_SP_RX_TH_STATS

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sp_rx_th_stats_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minor version used for tracking the version of this parameter ID

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: frame_duration_in_ms
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Frame duration in milliseconds for Thermal Rx statistics.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: frame_num

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vc_resis_q24
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Voice coil resistance array (in Ohms).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: vc_temp_q22
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Voice coil temperature array (in degrees C)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: th_gain_lnk_db_q23
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Gain control array (in deciBels)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: target_temp_q22
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Targeted temperature at which temperature control kicks in.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Voice coil resistance array (in Ohms).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Voice coil temperature array (in degrees C)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: th_gain_lnk_db_q23
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Gain control array (in deciBels)

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_SP_RX_EX_STATS
PARAMETER.description: parameter used for logging the algorithm internal variables#[ #] related to exertion.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sp_rx_ex_stats_minor_version

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: xmax_q14

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pred_peak_exc_q14

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ctrl_peak_exc_q14

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: dwn_compression_thr_db_q23
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: downward compression threshold, in dB.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: up_compression_thr_db_q23

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: exp_thr_db_q23
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Expansion threshold, in dB.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: max_input_rms_db_q23
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: RMS level of the input, in dB (max over the frequency of generating RTM packets.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: max_smoothed_agc_gain_q27
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Smoothed AGC gain applied to the signal (max over the frequency of generating RTM packets).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: features

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_ENABLE
PARAMETER.description: Enables a specified module.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables the module.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Used for alignment; must be set to 0.

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_SP_TH_VI_MODE_CFG
PARAMETER.description: parameter used process Vsens and Isens data for extracting the#[ #] speaker temperature.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sp_th_vi_mode_cfg_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minor version used for tracking the version of this parameter ID

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: operation_mode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Operation mode of thermal VI module.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: r0t0_selection_flag_1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies which set of R0, T0 values the algorithm will use. This field is valid only in Normal mode (operation_mode =#[ #] 0).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: r0t0_selection_flag_2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies which set of R0, T0 values the algorithm will use. This field is valid only in Normal mode (operation_mode =#[ #] 0).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: r0_cali_q24
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Calibration point resistance per device (in Ohms). This field is valid only in Normal mode (operation_mode = 0).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: t0_cali_q6
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Calibration point temperature per device (in degrees C). This field is valid in both Normal mode and Calibration mode.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: quick_calib_flag
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Indicates whether calibration is to be done in quick mode or not. This field is valid only in Calibration mode (operation_mode = 1).#[ #] @h2xmle_rangeList {disabled=0;enabled=1

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_SP_TH_VI_STATIC_CFG
PARAMETER.description: parameter used to configure static parameters of thermal VI#[ #] processing.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sp_th_vi_static_cfg_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minor version used for tracking the version of this parameter ID

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ctrl_rate
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Thermal control rate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pow_supply_freq
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies the power supply frequency.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pt_lvl_switch_en
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies whether to enable the dynamic pilot tone level switch.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pt_masking_delay_ms
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Delay in ramping down the pilot tone (in milli seconds).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pt_masking_thr_q27
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies the input level threshold below which the pilot tone is disabled.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: temp_est_selection_flag
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Temperature estimation selection flag.

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_SP_TH_VI_STATIC_CFG_V1
PARAMETER.description: parameter used to configure static parameters of thermal#[ #] VI processing.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sp_th_vi_static_cfg_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minor version used for tracking the version of this parameter ID

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ctrl_rate
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Thermal control rate.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pow_supply_freq
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies the power supply frequency.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pt_lvl_switch_en
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies whether to enable the dynamic pilot tone level switch.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pt_masking_delay_ms
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Delay in ramping down the pilot tone (in milli seconds).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pt_masking_thr_q27

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_SP_TH_VI_DYNAMIC_CFG
PARAMETER.description: parameter used to configure dynamic thermal parameters for#[ #] feedback speaker protection VI processing.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sp_th_vi_dynamic_cfg_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minor version used for tracking the version of this parameter ID

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_pilot_tone_scale_u16q18
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left speaker: scale of the pilot tone relative to 0 dBFS (for example, -40 dB from the full scale).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_wait_time_ms
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left#[ #] speaker: wait time for initial settling before collecting statistics (in milli seconds).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_cali_time_ms
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left#[ #] speaker: calibration time (in milli seconds).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_r0_safe_q24
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left speaker: backup calibration point resistance when per-device calibration is not available (in Ohms.)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_t0_safe_q6
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left#[ #] speaker: backup calibration point temperature when per-device calibration is not available (in degrees C).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_r_spk_coil_typ_q8
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Typical resistance of the left speaker (in Ohms).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_r_spk_coil_factor_q10
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left speaker: factor used to determine the threshold for speaker coil resistance (threshold for speaker coil resistance = factor *#[ #] speaker coil resistance). After this threshold, the speaker is considered open.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_v_full_sc_q10
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left#[ #] speaker: voltage for digitally full scale signal.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_spk_resistivity_coeff_u16q7
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left speaker: resistivity coefficient i.e: 1/degree C (in degrees C).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_vsen_2_v_u16q11
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left speaker: conversion factor from Vsens digital to volts.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_isen_2_a_u16q11
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left speaker: conversion factor from Isens digital to amps.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_v_pilot_thsd_u16q16
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left speaker: fraction of the expected pilot tone. Below this value, the resistance update is unreliable.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_r0_und_est_fac_q16
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left speaker: underestimate R0 if it is quick calibration.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_r0_rng_fac_q10
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left#[ #] speaker: factor used to determine the threshold for calculated calibrated resistance (threshold for calibrated resistance = factor * calibrated#[ #] resistance). After this threshold, calibrated resistance is considered as failed.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_t0_min_q6
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left#[ #] speaker: minimum expected temperature from calibration (in degrees C).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_t0_max_q6
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left#[ #] speaker: maximum expected temperature from calibration (in degrees C).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_pilot_tone_scale_u16q18
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right speaker: scale of the pilot tone relative to 0 dBFS (for example, -40 dB from the full scale).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_wait_time_ms
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right#[ #] speaker: wait time for initial settling before collecting statistics (in milli seconds).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_cali_time_ms
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right#[ #] speaker: calibration time (in milli seconds).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_r0_safe_q24
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right speaker: backup calibration point resistance when per-device calibration is not available (in Ohms).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_t0_safe_q6
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right#[ #] speaker: backup calibration point temperature when per-device calibration is not available (in degrees C).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_r_spk_coil_typ_q8
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right speaker: typical resistance of the speaker (in ohms).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_r_spk_coil_factor_q10
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right speaker: factor used to determine the threshold for speaker coil resistance (threshold for speaker coil resistance = factor *#[ #] speaker coil resistance). After this threshold, the speaker is considered open.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_v_full_sc_q10
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right#[ #] speaker: speaker voltage for a digitally full-scale signal.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_spk_resistivity_coeff_u16q7
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right speaker: resistivity coefficient i.e 1/degree C (in degrees C).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_vsen_2_v_u16q11
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right speaker: conversion factor from Vsens digital to volts.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_isen_2_a_u16q11
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right speaker: conversion factor from Isens digital to amps.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_v_pilot_thsd_u16q16
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right speaker: fraction of the expected pilot tone. Below this value, the resistance update is unreliable.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_r0_und_est_fac_q16
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right speaker: underestimate R0 if it is quick calibration.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_r0_rng_fac_q10
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right speaker: factor used to determine the threshold for calculated calibrated resistance (threshold for calibrated resistance = factor#[ #] * calibrated resistance). After this threshold, calibrated resistance is considered as failed.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_t0_min_q6
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right#[ #] speaker: minimum expected temperature from calibration (in degrees C).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_t0_max_q6
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Right#[ #] speaker: maximum expected temperature from calibration (in degrees C).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_spk_delta_t_delta_r_ratio_u16q9
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: speaker deltaT/deltaR = 1/(change in resistance per unit change in temperature)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: right_spk_delta_t_delta_r_ratio_u16q9
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: speaker deltaT/deltaR = 1/(change in resistance per unit change in temperature).

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_SP_TH_VI_CALIB_RES_CFG
PARAMETER.description: Parameter used to get the calibrated resistance value#[ #] from the feedback speaker VI processing module.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sp_th_vi_calib_res_cfg_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tracks the current version of this parameter

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: r0_cali_q24
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Calibration point resistance per device. In Calibration mode, this resistance is not valid.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: th_vi_ca_state
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Represents the calibration state for both speakers. The state of each speaker is tied together.

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_SP_TH_VI_FTM_CFG
PARAMETER.description: parameter used to set the FTM configuration in the feedback#[ #] speaker thermal VI processing module.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sp_th_vi_ftm_cfg_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minor version used for tracking the version of this parameter ID

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wait_time_ms
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Wait time to heat up the speaker before collecting statistics for FTM mode (in milli seconds).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ftm_time_ms
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Time period when FTM statistics are collected (in milli seconds).

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_SP_TH_VI_FTM_PARAMS
PARAMETER.description: parameter used to get the FTM statistics from the Thermal VI#[ #] processing module.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sp_th_vi_ftm_params_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minor version used for tracking the version of this parameter ID

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ftm_dc_res_q24
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: DC resistance value (in Ohms).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ftm_temp_q22
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Temperature value (in degrees C).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: status
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: FTM packet status.

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_ENABLE
PARAMETER.description: Enables a specified module.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables the module.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Used for alignment; must be set to 0.

MODULE.name: AFE_MODULE_SPEAKER_PROTECTION_EX_VI
MODULE.description: Speaker Protection Excursion VI Module, which is used to process Vsens and Isens#[ #] data for extracting speaker excursion information.

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_SP_EX_VI_STATIC_CFG
PARAMETER.description: parameter used configure the static parameters of feedback#[ #] Speaker Protection Excursion VI processing.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sp_ex_vi_static_cfg_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minor version used for tracking the version of this parameter ID

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ex_filter_taps
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Number of taps in the excursion prediction.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: exc_fine_tune_en_flag
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies whether the Tuning mode is enabled.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: tuning_mode_en_flag
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies whether RTM tuning mode is enabled.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pt_lvl_switch_en
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies whether to enable the dynamic pilot tone level switch.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pt_masking_delay_ms
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Delay in ramping down the pilot tone (in milli seconds).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: pt_masking_thr_q27
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies the input level threshold below which the pilot tone is disabled.

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_SP_EX_VI_DYNAMIC_CFG
PARAMETER.description: parameter used to configure the dynamic parameters of#[ #] excursion VI processing.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sp_ex_vi_dynamic_cfg_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minor version used for tracking the version of this parameter ID

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: impedance_convergence_level_thr_q15
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Impedance convergence level threshold.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ex_filter_stable_level_thr_q31
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Excursion prediction filter stability threshold.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ex_filter_energy_level_thr_q31
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Excursion prediction filter energy threshold as compared to the shape of the reference filter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: impedance_convergence_speed_ctrl_cnst_q31
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Impedance convergence speed control parameter. The higher the value, the faster the convergence, but with more#[ #] noise.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_re_typ_q24
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left#[ #] speaker: typical resistance of the speaker. (in Ohm)

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_vsen_2_v_q24
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left speaker: Vsens scaling constant.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_isen_2_a_q24

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_amp_gain_q24
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left speaker: amplifier gain used when scaling a Tx Vsens signal to an Rx signal.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_re_q24
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left#[ #] speaker: dc resistance parameter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_le_q24
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left#[ #] speaker: inductance parameter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_bl_q24

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_fct_q20

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_qmct_q24
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left#[ #] speaker: Q factor parameter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_rect_q24
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left#[ #] speaker: mechanical resistance parameter.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_pi_scale_q31
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left speaker: scale of the pilot tone relative to 0 dBFS (for example, -40 dB from the full scale).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: left_tol_range_q15
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Left#[ #] speaker: tolerance range for speaker parameters (for example, 20%).

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_SP_EX_VI_STATS
PARAMETER.description: Parameter used to log excursion VI algorithm internal#[ #] variables.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sp_ex_vi_stats_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tracks the current version of this parameter

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: frame_duration_in_ms
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Frame duration in milliseconds for Excursion VI statistics.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: frame_num
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Frame number of the Excursion VI statistics. This field is reset to zero after crossing the maximum limit for uint32 variables.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: exc_fine_tune_en_flag
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Specifies whether fine tuning is enabled for Excursion statistics.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: impedance_mag_response
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Impedance magnitude response.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: excursion_mag_response
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Excursion magnitude response.

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_SP_ADV_EX_VI_STATS
PARAMETER.description: parameter used o log advanced excursion VI algorithm#[ #] internal variables.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sp_adv_ex_vi_stats_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minor version used for tracking the version of this parameter ID

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: frame_duration_in_ms
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Frame duration in milliseconds for advanced Excursion VI statistics.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: frame_num
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Frame number of the advanced Excursion VI statistics. This field is reset to zero after it crosses the maximum limit for uint32#[ #] variables.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: impedance_response
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Impedance response.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: re
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Predicted DC voice coil resistance.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: le
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Predicted voice coil inductance.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: bl
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Predicted voice coil force factor.

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_SP_EX_VI_MODE_CFG
PARAMETER.description: parameter used to configure the mode of Feedback Speaker#[ #] Protection Excursion VI processing.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sp_ex_vi_mode_cfg_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minor version used for tracking the version of this parameter ID

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: operation_mode
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Operation mode of the Excursion VI module.

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_SP_EX_VI_FTM_CFG
PARAMETER.description: parameter used to set the FTM configuration in the Excursion VI#[ #] processing module.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sp_ex_vi_ftm_cfg_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minor version used for tracking the version of this parameter ID

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: wait_time_ms
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Wait time to heat up the speaker before collecting statistics for FTM mode (in milli seconds).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ftm_time_ms
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Period of time when FTM statistics are collected (in milli seconds).

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_SP_EX_VI_FTM_PARAMS
PARAMETER.description: parameter used to get the FTM statistics from the Excursion#[ #] VI module.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: sp_ex_vi_ftm_params_minor_version
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Minor version used for tracking the version of this parameter ID

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ftm_fct_q20
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Resonance frequency (in Hz).

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ftm_rect_q24
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Mechanical resistance.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ftm_qmct_q24
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Mechanical Qfactor.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: status
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: FTM packet status.

PARAMETER.name: AFE_PARAM_ID_ENABLE
PARAMETER.description: Enables a specified module.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables the module.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Used for alignment; must be set to 0.
